name: Remnants of a Beautiful Day (2012)
description: A unique artistic First Person Narrative experience! This game got 3RD in GMC JAM 8! A 2016 remake of this game can also be found here on steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/466830/Remnants_of_a_Beautiful_Day/?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.5 ghz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics Family DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 27 MB available space
